Name: Fossil fuel CO2 emissions
Uncert Comments: Andres et al. Tellus 2014 (calculated by R. Andres for the region considered - dependent countries uncertainty assumed)
Comments: CDIAC - Note King et al. 2014 BGD ; Note :  1796 TgC y-1 in SOCCR 2007 table II.2 pp. 61 for year 2002 (average of 3 different reported  estimates)

Name: ∆C
Comments: King et al. 2014 BGD ; Changes in terrritorial C stocks (  including ecosystem C pool and product pool changes ) ""atm flow method"" ( Table 1 ) + burial

Name: NEE
Comments: Mass balance : Change of territorial C stocks +  lateral exports

Name: Land use change
Uncert Comments: From SOCCR reported uncertainty on each term converted from 95% CI to 1 sigma by dividing by two
Comments: SOCCR 2007 Note :  LUC is defined by the sum of agriculuiral soil C balance + woody encroachement in SOCCR Table ES.I pp. 6

Name: NPP
Comments: Running et al. 2004 and Zhao et al. 2005 MOD17A3.005

Name: Soil Heterotrophic Respiration
Comments: Mass balance - rivers outgassing Raymond et al.

Name: Fire emissions
Comments: GFED4  only non deforestation and non agricultural fires Note Turner et al. GCB 2012 for year 2004 had 142 ± 45 (estimate not used)GFED4  only non deforestation and non agricultural fires Note Turner et al. GCB 2012 for year 2004 had 142 ± 45 (estimate not used)

Name: Wood product decay
Comments: SOCCR 2007 p91 (defined from landfills wood products emissions - includes emisions as CH4 and no data from Mexico)- Note : inconsistent with  production (SOCCR p110) -export - wood product storage change (King pers. Com - email 2013) = 128 - 61 - 68 = -1 Tg C ; Note a forest harvest removal of 165 TgC y-1  (Hayes et al. Table 6.6)SOCCR 2007 p91 (defined from landfills wood products emissions - includes emisions as CH4 and no data from Mexico)- Note : inconsistent with  production (SOCCR p110) -export - wood product storage change (King pers. Com - email 2013) = 128 - 61 - 68 = -1 Tg C ; Note a forest harvest removal of 165 TgC y-1  (Hayes et al. Table 6.6)

Name: Crop product consumption
Comments: SOCCR 2007 p88 for crop production (217) minus SOCCR2007 crop trade net export (35)

Name: Crop export
Comments: SOCCR2007 crop trade net export (35  Note : Peters et al. BG 2012 give 38.4 Tg C yr-1

Name: Soil C export to rivers
Comments: Mass balance =  outgas + export to ocean Note :  including report of  burial = 20 Tg yr-1 (  SOCCR 2007 p 36  )

Name: River export to ocean
Comments: Calculated as C fluxes to estuaries - estuarine outgasing

Name: Fossil fuel CO2 emissions
Uncert Comments: 7.4% 1 sigma from Andres et al. Tellus 2014 (USSR)

Name: ∆C
Uncert Comments: 1-sigma Dolman pp.5335 have 196 TgC yr-1 at 90% CI

Name: NPP
Uncert Comments: Assumed 20%  ; note Dolman p 5327 report 5% error

Name: Soil Heterotrophic Respiration
Uncert Comments: Propagated  ; note Dolman p 5327 report 10% error

Name: Fossil fuel CO2 emissions
Uncert Comments: Andres et al. Tellus 2014 ; only 1-sigma error for France used by default, needs to be redone

Name: Freshwater outgasing
